      • check

        public void check(Piece piece)
        Leads the AI to corresponding methods according to the type of the piece and refreshes some information about the piece.
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece that needs orders

      • scanning

        public void scanning(Row[] rows)
        Scans all the columns and finds which unit is empty at the top. Saves these Y coordinates into an array called surfaceY[];
        Parameters:
        rows - The 20 rows on the game board
